title: So the new Ryze update

embed.description: The Rune Mage For a millennium, the archmage Ryze scoured the world, seeking out ancient runes and storing their power in his arcane scroll. Though Ryze cares deeply for his fellow men, he must forever remain apart from them-this often causes him to seem curt and temperamental to those he protects.

body:
He might still scale off of mana, but god damn does his kit look like something more useful than both previous iterations.

Those stupid cooldown crazy passives are finally gone and his ult isn't just a glorified damage and speed boost, only downside, no more spellvamp.
